Welcome to NMC Cloud Solutions

Your one-stop destination for world-class cloud services that empower businesses with scalable, secure, and reliable infrastructure. Our solutions are designed to meet the demands of the digital age while prioritizing security, compliance, and customer growth.

Vision

Empowering businesses with scalable, flexible, and cost-effective cloud solutions to drive innovation and growth.

Our mission is to focus on SMBs in the key regions of:

  • India
  • Middle East
  • United States & Canada

Cutting edge facilities with 40Gbps network.

Unwavering commitment to server reliability.

HYPERCONVERGED INFRASTRUCTURE

Optimized use of multiple hardware layers.

Round-the-clock ticket-based assistance.

Why Cloud?

  • Placing your IT infrastructure (Compute & Storage) in the Cloud ensures:
  • Cost optimisation of your IT resources
  • Reduce your TCO (Total Cost of Ownership)
  • Utilise best-in-class hardware - always
  • Streaming content like the pros

Key Capabilities of NMC Cloud

NMC Cloud is designed to provide maximum security, resilience, and 99.99% uptime, ensuring your business operations run smoothly with minimal disruption. Our architecture integrates compute, storage, and networking resources in a streamlined solution that ensures efficiency and scalability, while offering advanced features to safeguard your digital assets.

Below are some of the powerful features that drive our infrastructure’s efficiency:

VM Instances

Secure and scalable virtual machine instances that are optimized for performance and availability.

Kubernetes Containers

Simplified container orchestration for Kubernetes to manage and scale containerized applications effortlessly.

Marketplace

Access to a wide range of pre-configured applications and services via our cloud marketplace, allowing for fast deployment.

VM Snapshots

Protect and restore your virtual machines with instant snapshots, ensuring minimal downtime and data integrity.

Native Autoscale

Auto-adjust resources based on demand with native autoscale, ensuring high performance during traffic spikes and cost-efficiency during low usage.

Object Storage

Scalable and secure object storage for your unstructured data, making it easy to store and retrieve large amounts of information.

SSH Key Manager

Manage and secure SSH keys for remote access to your cloud instances, enhancing security through centralized management.

Burstability in Public Cloud

Seamlessly scale your resources in the public cloud with bursting capabilities, ensuring performance during peak demand periods.

NMC CLOUD DIFFERENTIATOR

Our partnership with PappayaCloud, the forerunner in Cloud technology ensures that we provide our SMB customers the same benefits that are enjoyed by Enterprise and Govt clients, but at a much lower cost.

Our Compute & Storage is co-located in tier-4 certified data centers across India.
